about_the_game:
This Demo is contains roughly 40% of the full game - It is free to encourge players to test out the game before deciding to buy. The game itself takes a little while to get into, so I figured you need a good amount of content to get full feel of what the game is about.

If you like this demo, please consider buying the full product!
detailed_description:
This Demo is contains roughly 40% of the full game - It is free to encourge players to test out the game before deciding to buy. The game itself takes a little while to get into, so I figured you need a good amount of content to get full feel of what the game is about.

If you like this demo, please consider buying the full product!
legal_notice: This game has been made by Mattias Myde, Edym Pixels ©. It has been made with GameMaker Studio 2.
name: Hollow Island Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 CPU m370 2.40GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Ati mobility radeon HD 5000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This Demo is contains roughly 40-50% of the full game - It is free to encourge players to test out the game before deciding to buy. The game itself takes a little while to get into, so I figured you need a good amount of content to get full feel of what the game is about!
